ygData.subject: RE: Gypsy Lute Fun
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Yeah, and what I was saying was that in most groups I ve been in, the decision would ve gone:  Drum.  Bards use drums.  One bard in the party.  Bard gets
ygData.messageBody:
On Wed, 12 Jan 2000, James Schuldes wrote:
>
> I know I can be cryptic at times but I thought that was pretty clear:
>
> "only 2 of the 8 people there had any interest in the drums"
>
> (even though I told em they can be sold for maybe 500pp)
>
> The group leader said, "ok, anyone who wants to /random 1 100 highest number
> wins."
>
> only 2 people rolled

Yeah, and what I was saying was that in most groups I've been
in, the decision would've gone: Drum. Bards use drums. One
bard in the party. Bard gets drum.

Lately, I've been joining in on lottos if someone who can't
use an item wants in on it (which fortunately is rare). If I
win, I just give it to the person who can use it.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
